languages.text: The divine presence who sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over His willing servants as their rightful master. He is depicted and worshipped in myriad forms by souls beyond counting. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.
languages.original_text: Отец, Хранитель и Бог Человечества. Возвышаясь над своими преданными слугами, Император восседает на Золотом Троне Терры в сердце Империума. Он был и остается сильнейшим из когда-либо существовавших человеческих псайкеров. Благодаря его Империуму, Человечество едино и остается одним из сильнейших разумных видов в галактике.

traits.locale_text: The Father, the Guardian, and the God of Humankind, the Emperor sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over his willing servants as their rightful master. He was, and remains, the most powerful human psyker to have ever been born. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.

The Father, the Guardian, and the God of Humankind, the Emperor sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over his willing servants as their rightful master. He was, and remains, the most powerful human psyker to have ever been born. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.

The divine presence who sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over His willing servants as their rightful master. He is depicted and worshipped in myriad forms by souls beyond counting. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.

languages.text: Отец, Хранитель и Бог Человечества. Возвышаясь над своими преданными слугами, Император восседает на Золотом Троне Терры в сердце Империума. Он был и остается сильнейшим из когда-либо существовавших человеческих псайкеров. Благодаря его Империуму, Человечество едино и остается одним из сильнейших разумных видов в галактике.

Die göttliche Präsenz, die auf dem Goldenen Thron von Terra im Herzen des Imperiums sitzt und als ihr rechtmäßiger Herr über seine willigen Diener thront. Er wird in unzähligen Formen von Myriaden von Seelen dargestellt und verehrt. Durch sein Imperium ist die Menschheit geeint und bleibt eine der mächtigsten intelligenten galaktischen Spezies.
languages.original_text: The divine presence who sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over His willing servants as their rightful master. He is depicted and worshipped in myriad forms by souls beyond counting. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.

traits.locale_text: Die göttliche Präsenz, die auf dem Goldenen Thron von Terra im Herzen des Imperiums sitzt und als ihr rechtmäßiger Herr über seine willigen Diener thront. Er wird in unzähligen Formen von Myriaden von Seelen dargestellt und verehrt. Durch sein Imperium ist die Menschheit geeint und bleibt eine der mächtigsten intelligenten galaktischen Spezies.

languages.text: Être divin siégeant sur le Trône d'Or de Terra, au cœur de l'Imperium, et régnant en maître légitime sur ses serviteurs consentants. Les innombrables âmes qui le vénèrent le représentent sous une multitude de formes. Grâce à son Imperium, l'Humanité est unie et demeure l'une des espèces intelligentes les plus puissantes de la galaxie.
languages.original_text: The divine presence who sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over His willing servants as their rightful master. He is depicted and worshipped in myriad forms by souls beyond counting. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.

traits.locale_text: Être divin siégeant sur le Trône d'Or de Terra, au cœur de l'Imperium, et régnant en maître légitime sur ses serviteurs consentants. Les innombrables âmes qui le vénèrent le représentent sous une multitude de formes. Grâce à son Imperium, l'Humanité est unie et demeure l'une des espèces intelligentes les plus puissantes de la galaxie.

languages.text: 帝国的神明，高高坐在泰拉的黄金王座上。祂高高地立在祂的仆人之上，是所有人类共同的主宰。祂被无数人类以无数种形式描绘、崇拜。通过帝皇的神圣帝国，人类团结一致，成为整个银河系中最强大的智慧物种之一。
languages.original_text: The divine presence who sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over His willing servants as their rightful master. He is depicted and worshipped in myriad forms by souls beyond counting. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.

traits.locale_text: 帝国的神明，高高坐在泰拉的黄金王座上。祂高高地立在祂的仆人之上，是所有人类共同的主宰。祂被无数人类以无数种形式描绘、崇拜。通过帝皇的神圣帝国，人类团结一致，成为整个银河系中最强大的智慧物种之一。

languages.text: 帝国の中心にある地球の黄金の玉座に座り、自分たちの正当なマスターとして喜んで仕える者たちの上にそびえ立つ、神聖な存在。彼は数え切れないほどの魂によって無数の姿で描かれ、崇拝されている。彼の帝国を通して人類は団結し、銀河系で最も強力な知的種族のひとつであり続けている。
languages.original_text: The divine presence who sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over His willing servants as their rightful master. He is depicted and worshipped in myriad forms by souls beyond counting. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の中心にある地球（テラ）の黄金の玉座に座り、自分たちの正当なマスターとして喜んで仕える者たちの上にそびえ立つ、神聖な存在。彼は数え切れないほどの魂によって無数の姿で描かれ、崇拝されている。彼の帝国を通して人類は団結し、銀河系で最も強力な知的種族のひとつであり続けている。

languages.text: Presencia divina que se sienta en el Trono Dorado de Terra, en pleno Imperium, vislumbrando a sus fieles siervos como su legítimo señor. Cuenta con toda una plétora de formas de representación y adoración. Gracias a Su Imperium, la Humanidad se encuentra unida y se alza como una de las especies inteligentes más poderosas de la galaxia.
languages.original_text: The divine presence who sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over His willing servants as their rightful master. He is depicted and worshipped in myriad forms by souls beyond counting. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.

traits.locale_text: Presencia divina que se sienta en el Trono Dorado de Terra, en pleno Imperium, vislumbrando a sus fieles siervos como su legítimo señor. Cuenta con toda una plétora de formas de representación y adoración. Gracias a Su Imperium, la Humanidad se encuentra unida y se alza como una de las especies inteligentes más poderosas de la galaxia.

languages.text: İmparatorluk'un merkezi olan Terra'nın Altın Tahtı'nda oturan ve sadık hizmetkârları üzerinde meşru efendileri olarak hüküm süren ilahi varlık. Kendisine sayısız suret ve isimle dualar edilir ve tapınılır. Kurduğu İmparatorluk sayesinde İnsanlık birleşmiş ve galaksideki en güçlü zeki türlerden biri hâline gelmiştir.
languages.original_text: The divine presence who sits on the Golden Throne of Terra in the heart of the Imperium, towering over His willing servants as their rightful master. He is depicted and worshipped in myriad forms by souls beyond counting. Through His Imperium, Humankind is united and remains one of the most powerful intelligent species in the galaxy.
